attributes.action: NHS staff should be getting free travel during Coronavirus emergency.
attributes.additional_details: Make NHS workers travel free for the duration of the Coronavirus pandemic.
attributes.background: NHS staff are paying high travel costs on low wages and now needing to buy extra tickets when working extra hours and their ticket expires. We should support them also and make this free. They are asked to work extra shifts, most will work for first 3 hours for free to cover their travel ticket !!
